titleStmt.title: The Jewish synagogue, or, An historical narration of the state of the Jewes at this day dispersed over the face of the whole earth ... / translated out of the learned Buxtorfius ... by A.B., Mr. A. of Q. Col. in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Buxtorf, Johann, 1599-1664.
A. B., Mr. A. of Q. Col. in Oxford.
